
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
salary <- read.csv("data/The History of Baseball dataset/salary.csv")
pitching <- read.csv("data/The History of Baseball dataset/pitching.csv")
batting <- read.csv("data/The History of Baseball dataset/batting.csv")
```

```{r}
head(salary)
head(pitching)
sal_pitch <- salary %>% 
  left_join(pitching)

sal_bat <- salary %>% 
  left_join(batting)
```
